snippet.title: Famicom Fighters - Black Mage's Trailer
snippet.description:
Black Mage is ready for his encounters in Famicom Fighters! He is also now available as a standalone release for M.U.G.E.N and Ikemen GO!

Download the full game and/or Black Mage here!: http://mcjimmy.net/famicomfighters.html

Other standalone characters were also updated too!

The theme used during the gameplay footage (Black and Blue Encounter) was done by MC Jimmy! You can find the music here: https://mcjimmy.bandcamp.com/album/famicom-fighters

Discord: https://discord.gg/XUUWb46
Twitter: https://twitter.com/FamicomFighters
MUGEN Fighters Guild: https://mugenguild.com/forum/famicom-fighters.405
DeviantArt: https://www.deviantart.com/famicomfighters
